channel.title: Comments on: Not All Warlocks Are Crazy. Probably.

item.title: By: actually
item.dc:creator: actually
item.description:
"Don't even plan on having a shot at rolling on it. I have personally tried to pass some gear to mages who needed it more than I did and they said no it's yours take it and gave it to me."
-so stupid, wow Rebirth can suck a cock
item.content:encoded:
“Don’t even plan on having a shot at rolling on it. I have personally tried to pass some gear to mages who needed it more than I did and they said no it’s yours take it and gave it to me.”

-so stupid, wow Rebirth can suck a cock

item.title: By: actually
item.dc:creator: actually
item.description:
Its a fucking game people, someone saying they want to PUG your wife isn't offensive, and if you take it to be that way then obviously you and your wife have some issues, like maybe you too busy raiding to fuck her every once in a while. if you gkick someone for saying they want to pug your wife you might as well stick a sign in your head that says "I am insecure".
that's all and if you agree that someone joking around saying they want to pug some jackass' wife is cause for a kick, you're just as fucking stupid
item.content:encoded:
Its a fucking game people, someone saying they want to PUG your wife isn’t offensive, and if you take it to be that way then obviously you and your wife have some issues, like maybe you too busy raiding to fuck her every once in a while. if you gkick someone for saying they want to pug your wife you might as well stick a sign in your head that says “I am insecure”.

that’s all
and if you agree that someone joking around saying they want to pug some jackass’ wife is cause for a kick, you’re just as fucking stupid

item.title: By: yunk
item.dc:creator: yunk
item.content:encoded:
Comments between friends/mates are usually not taken as insulting
there is a big difference between a little kid in your guild saying “your wife is a milf I want to pug her” and your buddy you go drinking with saying “dude your wife is hot!”

But even then I think said buddy would not say “I want to PUG your wife” that would probably get a punch.

item.title: By: Lottomannen
item.dc:creator: Lottomannen
item.description:
"it seems the guild he was talking about is not as pure as its other members make it out to be!"
They never are.
item.content:encoded:
“it seems the guild he was talking about is not as pure as its other members make it out to be!”

They never are.

item.title: By: Solidstate
item.dc:creator: Solidstate
item.description:
Comments between friends/mates are usually not taken as insulting, even when of a personal nature. This is true both in RL and in WoW.
Reading a few more of the comments, it seems as if at least on the surface, the sentence itself was not meant to be insulting, see posts 20-22 by a Rogue belonging to the said guild. Also from that Rogue, he seems to support the other statements by the Warlock. So while the Warlock may have gone over the edge with his later comments, it seems the guild he was talking about is not as pure as its other members make it out to be...
item.content:encoded:
Comments between friends/mates are usually not taken as insulting, even when of a personal nature. This is true both in RL and in WoW.

Reading a few more of the comments, it seems as if at least on the surface, the sentence itself was not meant to be insulting, see posts 20-22 by a Rogue belonging to the said guild.
Also from that Rogue, he seems to support the other statements by the Warlock. So while the Warlock may have gone over the edge with his later comments, it seems the guild he was talking about is not as pure as its other members make it out to be…

sadly, eonar is my server and I have grouped with said lock. The thread is an accurate portrayal of him.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: chicogrande
item.dc:creator: chicogrande
item.description:
Woot! I'm 500 rep into Friendly. Gotta keep grinding the forums for drama to reach Exalted! I wonder what Foton's rep rewards are like.
The official WoW forums never cease to amaze in providing countless examples of folks like our friend Aleksander here.
item.content:encoded:
Woot! I’m 500 rep into Friendly. Gotta keep grinding the forums for drama to reach Exalted! I wonder what Foton’s rep rewards are like.

item.title: By: Ross Smith
item.dc:creator: Ross Smith
item.description:
<blockquote>Are games somehow attracting people with almost zero social experience in the real world? There sure are a lot of them with MMOG accounts.</blockquote>
"...And in other shock news, scientists predict the sun may rise in the east tomorrow."
item.content:encoded:
